rules.natural: If the fintech platform has the feature of mobile banking, then it is product viable.

rules.prover9_expression: (funding_secured(fintech_platform) -> (-(-(has_technology(fintech_platform, blockchain) | (has_feature(fintech_platform, mobile_banking) | has_feature(fintech_platform, investment_tools))) -> requires_approval(fintech_platform, regulatory_body)) -> market_ready(fintech_platform)))
rules.natural: Provided that the fintech platform has secured funding, and if it is not the case that either it has the technology of blockchain or has the feature of mobile banking or has the feature of investment tools implies it requires approval from the regulatory body, then it is market ready.
Under the condition that there is investor commitment from venture capital, the fintech platform has secured funding.
There is investor commitment from venture capital or a grant is awarded from the government fund.
Whenever a grant is awarded from the government fund, the fintech platform has secured funding.
The development team has a positive technical review or the fintech platform has passed the security audit.

rules.prover9_expression: (security_audit_passed(fintech_platform) -> (-(has_technology(fintech_platform, blockchain) | (has_feature(fintech_platform, mobile_banking) | has_feature(fintech_platform, investment_tools))) -> requires_approval(fintech_platform, regulatory_body)))
rules.natural: Provided that the fintech platform has passed the security audit, then if it has the technology of blockchain or has the feature of mobile banking or has the feature of investment tools, it requires approval from the regulatory body.

rules.prover9_expression: (budget_overrun(fintech_platform) | (technical_review_positive(development_team) -> (-(has_technology(fintech_platform, blockchain) | (has_feature(fintech_platform, mobile_banking) | has_feature(fintech_platform, investment_tools))) -> requires_approval(fintech_platform, regulatory_body))))
rules.natural: Either the fintech platform has a budget overrun, or if the development team has a positive technical review, then should it have the technology of blockchain or has the feature of mobile banking or has the feature of investment tools, it requires approval from the regulatory body.

If the fintech platform has implemented core features, then it has the feature of mobile banking or it has the feature of investment tools.
Whenever the development team has completed the frontend, the fintech platform has implemented core features.
The development team has completed the frontend or the development team has completed the backend.
If the fintech platform has the feature of investment tools, then it is product viable.
Whenever the fintech platform has integrated API, it has implemented core features.
Provided that the fintech platform has optimized database, it has integrated API.

If the fintech platform has development complete, then it does not have a delayed launch.
The fintech platform has development complete or it has testing complete.

Should it not be true that the development team has completed the backend implies the fintech platform has optimized database, then the development team has scaling concerns.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(has_technology(fintech_platform, blockchain) | (has_feature(fintech_platform, mobile_banking) | has_feature(fintech_platform, investment_tools))) -> requires_approval(fintech_platform, regulatory_body)) -> delayed_launch(fintech_platform))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the fintech platform has the technology of blockchain or has the feature of mobile banking or has the feature of investment tools implies it requires approval from the regulatory body, then it has a delayed launch.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(has_technology(fintech_platform, blockchain) | (has_feature(fintech_platform, mobile_banking) | has_feature(fintech_platform, investment_tools))) -> requires_approval(fintech_platform, regulatory_body)) -> -market_ready(fintech_platform))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that the fintech platform has the technology of blockchain or has the feature of mobile banking or has the feature of investment tools implies it requires approval from the regulatory body, then it is not market ready.
